Html:
Anyone knows if this project is still alive? I see no activity here.
Should we consider to create a fork and continue the project?

Any answer from the project owner will be really appreciated.

Cheers!!

Project is dead for me.
In my development the plugin is replace with http://vswebessentials.com/.

Plugin is also open source :
https://github.com/madskristensen/WebEssentials2013
https://github.com/madskristensen/WebEssentials2012

Thank you very much for you honest answer. I've seen this extension but it seems it's only useful for vs2012 and up. Is there any way we can minify js in VS2010 with webessentials?

Best regards!

VS Addin Chirpy dead.

New VS Package WebEssentials.

Any full source code sample for more interesting VS Packages?

WebEssentials source code is available on github :
https://github.com/madskristensen/WebEssentials2013
https://github.com/madskristensen/WebEssentials2012
